name: Bousou Racer
description:
•Top-down racing game set in a one circular race track within the cyberpunk city of Minerva

•Random Events will occur during the race and impede the player’s ability to win the race

•These Random Events are unpredictable and is meant to keep the player in suspense, while he or she is trying to win the race

Select from five unique characters, each with a special ability/trait that can assist them during the race
